posts.post_title: WTB SGC T206 HOFers and SLers
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Scott L
Looking to buy the following in SGC 10 (nice eye appeal, no beaters, paperloss ok) to SGC 40. Due to my budget I'd be more interested in the upper tier HOFers(Young, Johnson)in 20 or 30. Please send scans and prices to scottlatsko@hotmail.com

Thanks!
